titleStmt.title: [Pharmako-basanos]: or, The touch-stone of medicines. Discovering the vertues of [brace] vegetables, minerals, & animals, by their tastes & smells. : In two volumes. / By Sir John Floyer ...
titleStmt.author: Floyer, John, Sir, 1649-1734.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Michael Johnson, bookseller: and are to be sold at his shops at Litchfield and Uttoxiter, in Stafford-shire; and Ashby-de-la-Zouch, in Leicester-shire.,

notesStmt.note: First words of title transliterated from Greek.
"... The sixth part ..." (p. [249]-340), and "An appendix to the second part ..." (p. [341]-416) at end of v. 2, have special title pages with imprints: London, Printed in the year, 1690.
Item at 761:26 is a reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Item at 2624:15 is a photocopy of original in University of Pennsylvania Library.
Item at 761:26 is incorrectly identified on film as F1388.
